title: Smart Agriculture Techniques: How Farmers Achieve High-Yield Cucumber Cultivation

tasks.task: Construct a greenhouse for melon cultivation
subtasks: Gather materials for greenhouse construction (steel frames, UV resistant polyethylene film)
Design the greenhouse structure for durability and plant protection
Install ventilation and temperature control systems
Loosen and enrich soil with nutrients
Plant melon seeds at appropriate spacing (30-50cm apart)
Set up automatic drip irrigation system for efficient water use
Use LED lighting to supplement sunlight when needed
Use manual pollination with brushes or introduce honeybees

tasks.task: Monitor and maintain plants during growth
subtasks: Regularly check for pests and diseases, apply treatments as needed
Prune leaves and side branches to support fruit growth
Hand-harvest melons gently to prevent damage
Sort harvested cucumbers for quality (inspect, remove substandard)
Pack cucumbers with ventilation holes for freshness preservation
Transport packed cucumbers to markets and distributors.
